sentences.en: After they finished their commission business, Chernomyrdin came to see me to brief me on events in Russia and Yeltsin’s prospects for reelection.
sentences.cn: 在他们完成了使命后，他来拜访我，向我简单介绍了俄罗斯的近况和叶利钦再次当选的前景。

sentences.en: At present cannot favor whether can win, full color reelection 31.
sentences.cn: 目前看不好是否能获胜, 足彩复选31.

sentences.en: Elected officials must reelection at periodic intervals, when their record is subject to intensive public scrutiny.
sentences.cn: 选举产生的官员必须定期接受改选, 届时其业绩要受到彻底的公开审查.

sentences.en: Every member of the House of Representatives and about one-third of the Senate is up for reelection in any given election year.
sentences.cn: 在每个规定的选举年中，全国都要重新选举全体的众议院议员和大约三分之一的参议院议员。

sentences.en: He will stand for reelection in his own district.
sentences.cn: 他将在自己的选区竞选连任.
她重新当选似乎是十拿九稳.

sentences.en: Mayor Jones comes up far reelection this fall.
sentences.cn: 琼斯市长今年秋天将再度参加竞选.

sentences.en: The mayor has a political machine working for his reelection.
sentences.cn: 市长有一政治机构为他的重新当选而奔波.

sentences.en: The president is going to stand for reelection.
sentences.cn: 这位总统准备参加竞选连任.

sentences.en: The proportion of incumbents who seek reelection is high and remarkably constant from election to election.
sentences.cn: 在职寻求连任的人在竞选人当中所占的比例是相当高的,历次选举以来这个比例也很稳定.

sentences.en: Two big companies compensate evenly press obviously, the reelection makes up 1.
sentences.cn: 两大公司平赔下压明显, 复选补“1”.

sentences.en: When he ran for reelection he got about two thirds of the vote.
sentences.cn: 难怪他再次竞选州长时,得了三分之二的高票.
